text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ مَدۡيَنَۖ وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰۖ فَأَمۡلَيۡتُ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
translation: 44. Kaadu madyan deqsitta baaxóh mari isi farmoyta Nabii Sheqeybi dirabboyseeh, firqawnaa kee firqawni mari sinni farmoyta Nabii Muusa dirabboyseh, tokkel anu korosuk digaalá waddiroysehik, tohuk lakat ummaan mara keenik ibbixeeh digaalehik, tokkel Yi- digaalaa kee Yi-assacokki mannak teneeh? Iyye Yalli.
